Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent to which President Obama's immigration plan can be considered "amnesty," as it is argued by opponents of the plan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to definitively label President Obama's immigration plan as "amnesty."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Obama's immigration plan can be accurately described as "amnesty," without considering alternative perspectives or interpretations.
Exist alternative explanations: There may be alternative explanations or viewpoints regarding the characterization of President Obama's immigration plan as "amnesty," which are not explored in the claim.
